★ WHY IS LIMENEX AWESOME ★
••••••••••••••••••••

  • FREE Websites Migration
    Migrating your websites can be a tedious and time-consuming task. Let Limenex do it for you, for FREE! Let us handle the hassle for you and enjoy a peace of mind knowing a team of professionals are doing the job for you. We will migrate all your data, your emails, your databases, your subdomains, FTP accounts, email forwarders, email filters, everything! All you have to do is to provide us with your cPanel login at your previous host and make sure we can retrieve functional full backups from them.
  • WordPress Optimized Hosting
    Our servers are configured to run your WordPress websites with the highest level of performance. As a Limenex customer, you gain excess to LiteSpeed Cache for WordPress, the fastest WordPress caching plugin to deliver unrivaled speed for your visitors.
  • High Performance Servers
    We build our powerful enterprise-grade servers with Dual Intel Xeon Processors, 64GB RAM and solid state drives (SSD) in RAID 10. If that's not enough, our innovative software, advanced in-house optimization techniques and many other secret recipes work together to create a reliable and unparalleled high performance web hosting experience that makes you wonder why we didn't charge more!
  • Premium Features
    Our premium high performance web hosting is filled with incredible premium features and services including LiteSpeed, CloudLinux, R1Soft, CloudFlare, Softaculous script installer, Site.pro Website Builder, MariaDB and many more! We love to stay ahead of the competition...wait...do we have any?
  • Amazing Prices
    Despite investing heavily in delivering a superior high performance web hosting experience, we are priced at extremely competitive and affordable rates to keep our customers happy and ensure we can deliver a consistently reliable service in the long run. Win-win ain't it?
  • 99.9% Uptime
    Keeping your websites up is our bread and butter. Unlike most of our competitors that offer negligible compensation, as written in our industry-leading SLA, we will give you a FULL month of FREE service if the uptime for the given month is less than 99.9%. No we're not kidding. Try us.
  • US & UK Servers
    We have servers in United States & United Kingdom! Take your closest pick to get the fastest speed for your websites!
  • In Business Since 2010
    There are hundreds of hosts selling unlimited-everything at $5/year disappearing everyday but Limenex has been in business for 8 solid years and counting! Our extensive business history is a testament to the reliability and quality of our high performance web hosting service our customers love.
  • Premium 24/7 Support
    We have professionals on standby 24/7 to watch over our servers and assist you whenever you need it! We pride ourselves with our industry leading response time of 10-15 minutes! Do we sleep? We don't!
  • 30 Days Moneyback Guarantee
    Don't be afraid to try our high performance web hosting! With our 30 days moneyback guarantee, it is absolutely risk-free! We will return you your money if you hate us, but we're certain you'll love us!
